name: Lucky
subtitle: The 15th Puppy
author: Brian Weisz

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: I use Lucky – The 15th Puppy’s ability Good As New and reveal 2 characters with cost 2 or less. Can I choose to add only 1 of the characters to my hand?
A: No. When choosing which cards to add to your hand with Lucky’s Good As New ability, you must add either all cost 2 or lower characters revealed or none of them.

rules_text: GOOD AS NEW — Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put each character card with cost 2 or less into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. PUPPY LOVE Whenever this character quests, if you have 4 or more other characters in play, your other characters get +1 this turn.
